title: Fix backend canister + full UI/UX polish sweep

requirements.text: Redeploy the backend Motoko actor with a no-op change (e.g. add or update a comment) to force a fresh canister deployment and bring it out of the stopped state, ensuring all update calls (addPlayer, deletePlayer) and all query calls are operational again.
acceptanceCriteria: The backend canister is in a running state after deployment
Calling addPlayer succeeds without IC0508 rejection
All query endpoints (getAllPlayers, getPlayersByTier, searchPlayers) return results without error

requirements.text: Redesign the Home page (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx) with improved visual hierarchy: a more impactful hero section with a prominent tagline, polished per-tier stat cards with glowing accent borders matching each tier color, a cleaner top-3 preview section with improved card layout, and better spacing and typography throughout. Ensure the admin access button is clearly visible but visually integrated into the design.

quotes: just fix everything and make it better

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section has a compelling headline and subtext with strong visual presence
Per-tier stat cards display tier colors with subtle glow effects
Top-3 preview section is clearly laid out with player name, tier badge, and score visible
Admin access button is visible and styled consistently with the gaming theme
Page looks polished and professional on both desktop and mobile

requirements.text: Polish the Tier List page (frontend/src/pages/TierListPage.tsx) and TierRow component (frontend/src/components/TierRow.tsx): improve the tier label design with stronger glow/gradient effects matching each tier's accent color, enhance player card layout in PlayerCard.tsx with better spacing and hover effects, improve the empty-state message styling, and refine the category filter integration visually.

quotes: just fix everything and make it better
polish the UI across all pages

acceptanceCriteria: Tier label badges have vivid glow/gradient effects per tier color
Player cards have visible hover states (scale or glow effect)
Empty-state message is styled and readable when no players exist
Category filter bar is visually polished and clearly shows the active selection
Layout is responsive and readable on all screen sizes

requirements.text: Polish the Leaderboard page (frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx): redesign the ranked table with alternating row highlights, stronger rank number badges (with gold/silver/bronze styling for top 3 positions), better tier badge styling in each row, improved column headers, hover effects on rows, and a polished empty-state view when no players exist.

quotes: just fix everything and make it better
polish the UI across all pages

acceptanceCriteria: Top 3 rank positions have gold, silver, bronze styled number badges
Table rows have subtle hover highlight effect
Tier badges in each row use the correct tier accent color
Column headers are bold and clearly readable
Empty state is styled with an informative message
Category filter is visually consistent with the Tier List page filter

requirements.text: Polish the AdminModal component (frontend/src/components/AdminModal.tsx): improve the modal's visual design with a more refined dark card, better form field styling (inputs, selects with consistent dark theme), clearer success/error notification styling, improved player list section with better row layout and delete button styling, and a more prominent logout button. Ensure the modal scrolls properly when the player list is long.

quotes: just fix everything and make it better

acceptanceCriteria: Modal card has a polished dark background with subtle border
All form inputs and selects have consistent dark-themed styling
Success notification is visually distinct (e.g. green accent)
Error messages are clearly styled in red/destructive color
Player list rows are readable with name, tier, category, score, and delete button
Modal body scrolls independently when content overflows
Logout button is clearly visible at bottom or top of the management UI

requirements.text: Polish the Navbar component (frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx): improve active link highlighting, refine the search input styling to match the dark gaming theme, improve mobile menu appearance, and add a subtle border or gradient line at the bottom of the navbar to separate it from page content.

quotes: just fix everything and make it better

acceptanceCriteria: Active navigation link is clearly highlighted with the HT1 accent color or an underline indicator
Search input has consistent dark-themed styling with a visible placeholder
Mobile hamburger menu opens and closes cleanly with styled links
Navbar has a visible bottom separator line or gradient
Logo/brand area is visually prominent

requirements.text: Polish the CategoryFilter component (frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.tsx): improve button sizing, spacing, and active state styling so the selected category is immediately obvious; add a subtle hover state on inactive buttons; ensure the filter bar wraps cleanly on smaller screens.

quotes: just fix everything and make it better

acceptanceCriteria: Active category button has a clear filled/glowing style distinct from inactive buttons
Inactive buttons have a visible hover effect
Buttons wrap onto multiple lines on small screens without breaking layout
All 9 options (All + 8 categories) are visible and readable

constraints: Do not change the password (65515616151) for the admin gate
Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Preserve all existing features: 10-tier system, category filter, admin modal, player add/delete, search, leaderboard, tier list
Do not alter the backend data schema or Player type structure
nonGoals: Adding new pages or routes beyond what already exists
Changing the tier system or category list
Adding new backend functions or changing the backend API
Adding Internet Identity or any authentication beyond the password gate
